subject: Tax Evasion
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian racecar driver Helio Castroneves was acquitted Friday of most charges that he tried to evade more than $2.3 million in United States income taxes.
snippet: The Brazilian racecar driver Helio Castroneves was acquitted Friday of most charges that he tried to evade more than $2.3 million in United States income taxes.
